[[inst_c_swi]]
==== C.SWI

*Syntax:* c.swi t#1, [srcL, simm]

*Description:* Compressed instruction variant (16-bit encoding).

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_c_swi.svg[C.SWI encoding,width=800]

*Uop-Class:* STA/BASE_IMM

*Compression:* C16 (len=16)

*Uop-Class payload:* `{"addr_mode": "BASE_IMM", "agu_kind": "STA", "note": "User confirmed A", "source": "group_rule", "split": ["AGU", "STD"], "uop_kind": "AGU"}`
